name: Kaeltrom's Saloon
description:
Remember the good old Whack-A-Mole? Now you can play a western style version of that classic game in your mobile phone!

You can play alone, trying your best to improve your high score. Or you can challenge your friends and play the 2 Player mode. Who will be the fastest shooter in the Kaeltrom's Saloon?

Right now the game is complete, but I'm working on new updates such as translation to other languages (spanish to begin with), ranked ladders and a new enemy. All new ideas and feedback are welcome!
